title: Faith in Jesus Christ
description: Faith in Jesus Christ is the first principle of the gospel and the foundation of all righteousness

title: Repentance
description: Repentance is a change of heart and mind that brings us closer to God

title: Baptism
description: Baptism is an essential ordinance to enter the kingdom of God

title: Gift of the Holy Ghost
description: The gift of the Holy Ghost guides us to all truth and comforts us

title: Prayer
description: Prayer is our direct line of communication with our Heavenly Father

title: Scripture Study
description: Daily scripture study strengthens our faith and knowledge

title: Service
description: Serving others is serving God and developing Christlike love

title: Temple
description: The temple is the house of the Lord where we make sacred covenants

title: Family
description: The family is ordained of God and central to His plan of happiness

title: Word of Wisdom
description: The Word of Wisdom is a law of health revealed by the Lord

title: Tithing
description: Tithing develops faith and shows our commitment to God

title: Sabbath Day
description: Keeping the Sabbath day holy brings us closer to Christ

title: Missionary Work
description: Sharing the gospel brings joy and blessings to others

title: Family History
description: Family history connects us to our ancestors

title: Covenants
description: Covenants are sacred promises between God and His children
